name: Sonic World with Sarah and Sally Sarcastically Sweetly Singing Softly so Sonic Shant Serenade Simon with Sea Shanties
text: Activate only if you control a "Sonic Duck". Your opponent cannot activate monster effects this turn also, you can only Summon "Sonic" monsters for the rest of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Sonic World with Sarah and Sally Sarcastically Sweetly Singing Softly so Sonic Shant Serenade Simon with Sea Shanties" per turn.
